documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Learn how to use SUPRSS and get the most out of your feeds.
documentation.introDescription: SUPRSS helps you manage and share your favorite RSS feeds. You can import feeds, organize them into collections, and collaborate with others in real time.

faq.q1: How do I add a new RSS feed?
faq.a1: Click the Speed Dial at the bottom right and select 'Add from URL' or 'Add from File'.
faq.q2: Can I share my feeds with my team?
faq.a2: Yes. Create a shared collection and invite your team members to collaborate.
faq.q3: Which formats are supported for import?
faq.a3: We support OPML, XML, and JSON formats for bulk import.
faq.a4: Yes. You can toggle dark mode in the settings or from the header menu.
faq.a5: Feeds are refreshed based on the update frequency you define during setup.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any support, questions, or suggestions, feel free to reach out to us.

privacy.title: Privacy & GDPR
privacy.description: SUPRSS only collects the minimum necessary data to operate your account, such as your email and subscribed feeds. Reading activity is private and stored locally.
privacy.rgpdNotice: In compliance with the GDPR, you can request access, modification, or deletion of your data via the account settings.

loading.message: Thank you for your patience while we prepare your dashboard...
